New Records: Rohit Sharma reached 4000 runs in T20I cricket
Key Match Events: India won the match by 8 wickets
Rishabh Pant finished off in style with an audacious manner
Virat Kohli was dismissed for just 1
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant stitched a good partnership
Rohit Sharma unleashed his trademark pull shots
Jasprit Bumrah took 5 wickets for 14 runs
Arshdeep Singh and Mohammed Siraj kept the Irish batters on their toes
Axar Patel and Ravindra Jadeja chipped in with one wicket apiece
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma said the preparation has been alright and it has been a bit challenging on this track but it's all about assessing the conditions
Paul Stirling said they would have bowled first as well with the overcast conditions around
Rohit Sharma said they are going with four seamers including Hardik Pandya and two spinning all-rounders are Axar Patel and Ravindra Jadeja
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said he is happy to get the two points
Paul Stirling said they kept losing wickets in the first innings and the Indian bowlers didn't miss their marks and kept bowling on good lines and lengths
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Irish batting effort was not much to write about
The pitch has not been the batter's friend
India have been relentless and the Irish found it extremely hard to adapt to the bounce and seam movement off the deck
